    • Constructor Detail

      • Engine

        public Engine(double maxRPM)
       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new engine given some passed in maxRPM. Initializes the engine to be off, have an RPM of 0 and sets the maximum RPM to that passed in. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the maxRPM is negative.
        Parameters:
        maxRPM -
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • Method Detail

      • setCurrentRPM

        public void setCurrentRPM(double newRPM)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Alters the RPM that this engine is currently operating at. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the RPM specified is higher than the maximum performance of this engine or its a negative number.
        Parameters:
        newRPM - - The new RPM that you wish this engine to perform at.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • turnOn

        public void turnOn()
            throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Tries to turn this engine on. Throws an IllegalStateException if the engine is already on.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException

      • turnOff

        public void turnOff()
             throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Tries to turn this engine off and sets its RPM to 0. Throws an IllegalStateException if the engine is already off.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException

      • getMaxRPM

        public double getMaxRPM()
        Returns the maximum RPM this engine can perform at.
        Returns:
        A double containing the maximum RPM.

      • getCurrentRPM

        public double getCurrentRPM()
        Returns the current RPM this engine is performing at.
        Returns:
        A double containing the current RPM.

      • getCurrentRPMMaxSpeed

        public double getCurrentRPMMaxSpeed()
        Returns the max speed according to the current RPM this engine is performing at.
        Returns:
        A double containing the current RPM.

      • isOn

        public boolean isOn()
        Returns whether the engine is currently on or not.
        Returns:
        A boolean representing whether the engine is on.
